name: ssehub.github.io
body:
# SSE projects at Github

This is the Github projects page of the [Software Systems Engineering (SSE)](http://www.sse.uni-hildesheim.de) group at the [University of Hildesheim](http://www.uni-hildesheim.de).

The following software projects are available on Github:
* [EASy-Producer](https://github.com/SSEHUB/EASyProducer.git), a product line tool developed in several projects such as [FP7 INDENICA](http://www.indenica.eu) or BMWi ScaleLog. See our [project page](http://www.sse.uni-hildesheim.de/easy-producer) for further information.
* [SPASS-Meter](https://github.com/SSEHUB/spassMeter.git), a flexible resource monitoring framework for Java (also developed in [FP7 INDENICA](http://www.indenica.eu). See our [project page](www.sse.uni-hildesheim.de/spass-meter)

Further available software projects are:
* [SVNControl](http://svncontrol.tigris.org) is a Java remote administration tool for Subversion (SVN) servers. It allows to manage repositories, users and their access permissions, use the scheduler to manipulate permissions automatically and handle hook scripts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
